(Simplified: 鹘)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 骨 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 骨 [ gǔ ] bone; skeleton; frame, framework
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①[方言]淹。［例］大家鶻得眼白，坐着喘息。——清·張南莊《何典》。

鶻字的基本解释

鶻
gǔ

鶻
hú
均见“鹘”。

鶻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǔ］
［《廣韻》古忽切，入没，見。］
［《廣韻》户八切，入黠，匣。］
“鹘1”的繁体字。
(1)见“鶻鵃”。
(2)船的一种。
[②]［hú］
［《廣韻》户骨切，入没，匣。］
“鹘2”的繁体字。
(1)鸟类的一科。翅膀窄而尖，嘴短而宽，上嘴弯曲并有齿状突起。飞得很快，善于袭击其它鸟类。也叫隼。
(2)见“鶻2圇”、“鶻2突”。

鶻字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶻； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1496第32
【唐韻】【集韻】?古忽切，音骨。【說文】鶻鵃也。【玉篇】班鳩也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶌鳩，鶻鵃。【註】似山雀而小，短尾，靑黑色，多聲，江東呼爲鶻鵃。【本草】鶻鵃，一名鶻嘲。北人呼爲?鷜鳥。【張衡·東京賦】鶻嘲春鳴。【正字通】鶻多義，冬撮鳥之盈握者，夜燠其爪掌，旦縱之。禽經曰：鶻不擊胎。【李邕鶻賦】營全鳩以自暖，乃詰朝而自釋。又官名。【左傳·昭十七年】鶻鵃氏司事也。又舟名。【海物異名記】越人水戰，舟名海鶻。急流浴浪不溺。又【廣韻】【集韻】?戸八切，音滑。義同。又【廣韻】戸骨切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】胡骨切，?音搰。【廣韻】鶻，鳥名。鷹屬。又回鶻。【唐書·回鶻傳】元魏時號高車部，隋曰韋紇，亦曰回紇，德宗時請改爲回鶻。

[①] [gǔ]
["Guangyun" ancient suddenly cuts, enters and disappears, see. ]
["Guangyun" household eight cuts, into the key, box. ]
Traditional characters for "鹘1".
(1) See "Falcon".
(2) A type of ship.
[②]［hú］
["Guangyun" household bone cut, in and out, box. ]
"鹘2" in traditional characters.
(1) A family of birds. The wings are narrow and pointed, the mouth is short and wide, and the upper mouth is curved and has tooth-like protrusions. Fly fast, good at attacking other birds. Also called Falcon.
(2) See "鹘2囵", "鹘2突".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹘; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1496 Page 32
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Gu suddenly cut, sound bone. 【Said the text】Falconry also. [Jade articles] Ban Jiu also. 【Erya·Shiniao】鶌-dove, 鹘鵃. [Note] Like a tit, it is small, short-tailed, black, and loud. Jiangdong is called a falcon. [Materia Medica] Falcon, a falcon mocks. The northerners call it a bird. 【Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu】The falcon laughs at Chunming. [Zhengzitong] The falcon has multiple meanings, and the person who holds the full grasp of the winter pinch of birds, Ye Xie has its claws and palms, and it is vertical. The Qin Jing said: Falcons do not strike the fetus. [Li Yongyi's Fu] Ying Quanjiu was self-warming, but he explained himself by censorship. Also official name. [Zuo Zhuan·17th Year of Zhao] Hu Shi also served as a secretary. Also the name of the boat. [Synonyms of Sea Objects] Yue people fight in water, and the boat is named Hai Falcon. The rapids do not drown in the waves. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Eight cuts, slippery sound. The same meaning. Also [Guang Yun] 戸 bone cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Hu bone cut,? Yin Di. [Guang Yun] Falcon, bird name. Eagle genus. Back to the falcon again. [Book of Tang·Uighur Biography] The High Car Department of the Yuan Dynasty, Wei He, and Hui He in the Sui Dynasty. Please change to the Uighur in the Dezong period.
